description: This file provides utility functions for interacting with localStorage, including getting, setting, and removing items with a namespaced key prefix. It also includes a helper function to safely parse JSON.

methods.name: function safeJSON<T>(raw: string | null, fallback: T): T { safeJSON
methods.description: Parses a JSON string safely, returning a fallback value if parsing fails or input is null/undefined.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a value from localStorage, parsing it from JSON, with a fallback if not found or invalid.

methods.name: set
methods.description: Stores a value in localStorage after serializing it as JSON.

ctags.name: safeJSON
ctags.pattern: /^function safeJSON<T>(raw: string | null, fallback: T): T {$/
